channel.title: How do you make it so you dont lose items when you die?
channel.description: How do you make it so you dont lose items when you die? Thanks, 1963328

item.title: How do you make it so you dont lose items when you die?
item.dc:creator: @Poon_Toon Poon Toon
item.description:
@Poon_Toon wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:4, topic:21456”]Oh. Find a part of the client where it says if(player.isDead){clearinventory();} someting like that.

The functions are usually named after what they do so you shouldnt have much trouble finding it.

Yeah, just comment that out. But dont comment out the respawning![/quote]

yeah man that should work if not, ask around

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make it so you dont lose items when you die?

item.title: How do you make it so you dont lose items when you die?

item.source: How do you make it so you dont lose items when you die?

item.title: How do you make it so you dont lose items when you die?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Oh. Find a part of the client where it says if(player.isDead){clearinventory();} someting like that.

The functions are usually named after what they do so you shouldnt have much trouble finding it.

Yeah, just comment that out. But dont comment out the respawning!

Read full topic
